name: Flurry
description: Make three consecutive blows with blinding speed.
shortDescription: Unleash three consecutive blows with blinding speed.

name: Whirlwind
description: Whirl in place, damaging surrounding enemies and deflecting projectiles and projectile-based spells. Charge this ability to widen its range and add forward movement while spinning.
shortDescription: Whirl in place, damaging surrounding enemies and deflecting projectiles.

name: Breath of Fire
description: Exhale a decimating cone of flames.
shortDescription: Exhale a decimating ?cone? of flames.

name: Moonlight Wave
description: Send forth waves of destructive force.
shortDescription: Send forth waves of destructive force.

name: Meteor
description: Calls forth a meteor from the heavens, dealing massive fire damage on impact. The ground is then set ablaze, which deals damage over time.
shortDescription: Call forth a meteor from the heavens, dealing massive damage on impact and setting the ground ablaze.

name: Fire Ball
description: Launch a sphere of writhing flame toward the target.
shortDescription: Launch a sphere of writhing flame toward the target.

name: Fire Wall
description: Ignite a wall of fire that stops projectiles, amplifies fire spells, and damages enemies who pass through.
shortDescription: Ignite an crackling wall of fire.

name: Rain of Fire
description: Create a fire storm that rains burning cinders on your enemies.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Create a fire storm that rains burning cinders on your enemies.

name: Flaming Dash
description: Dash a short distance, igniting enemies caught in the path.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Dash a short distance, igniting enemies caught in the path.

name: Infernal Cascade
description: Open a gateway to the deepest reaches of hell, sweeping your enemies away in a massive scorching inferno.
shortDescription: Open a gateway to the deepest reaches of hell, sweeping your enemies away in a massive scorching inferno.

name: Frozen Orb
description: Launch an orb of ice that scatters ice spikes along its path.
shortDescription: Launch an orb of ice that scatters ice spikes along its path.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Fire a lightning bolt that arcs between enemies.
shortDescription: Fire a lightning bolt that arcs between enemies.

name: Bone Prison
description: Summon a cage of bone around the target.
shortDescription: Summon a cage of bone around the target.

name: Ethereal Spear
description: Hurl a lance of ghostly energy toward the target.
shortDescription: Hurl a lance of ghostly energy toward the target.

name: Trueflight Arrow
description: Fire an enchanted arrow that seeks out the chosen target.
shortDescription: Fire an enchanted arrow that seeks out the chosen target.

name: Bone Barricade
description: Summon a wall of bone from the earth.
shortDescription: Summon a wall of bone from the earth.

name: Hell Fire Trap
description: Tear open a portal to hell that releases waves of incinerating flame.
shortDescription: Tear open a portal to hell that releases waves of incinerating flame.

name: Cure
description: Instantly replenishes an amount of health.
shortDescription: Instantly replenish an amount of health.

name: Dragon Strike
description: Each hit acquires a charge, up to 3, which can be discharged with a normal attack. The effect depends on the number of charges.
shortDescription: Acquire charges on hit, releasing them on a normal attack.

name: Storm Call
description: Invoke a raging tempest, blasting enemies with lightning
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Invoke a raging tempest, blasting enemies with *insert*

name: Grim Harvest Aura
description: Draw in the residual life force and energy contained in fallen combatants to heal.
shortDescription: Draw in the residual life force and energy contained in fallen combatants, reinvigorating yourself.

name: Leap
description: Jump through the air toward a target, dealing damage upon landing.
shortDescription: Jump through the air toward a target, dealing damage upon landing.

name: Slash
description: Make a simple melee attack.
shortDescription: Make a simple melee attack.

name: Shuriken Dance
description: Spin in place, launching a barrage of shurikens in all directions.
shortDescription: Spin in place, launching a barrage of shurikens in all directions.

name: Shuriken Throw
description: Hurl a massive shuriken in target direction, damaging the first enemy hit.
shortDescription: Hurl a massive shuriken in target direction, damaging the first enemy hit.

name: Inspiration
description: Utter a fierce warcry, inspiring allies and demoralizing enemies.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Utter a fierce warcry, inspiring allies and demoralizing enemies.

name: Flash
description: Teleport a short distance, releasing a lightning strike upon arrival.Â
shortDescription: Teleport a short distance, releasing a lightning strike upon arrival.

name: Voltaic Orb
description: Launch an orb of splintering electric energy.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Launch an orb of splintering electric energy.

name: Thunder Wrath
description: Devastate a large area with a barrage of lightning strikes.
shortDescription: Devastate a large area with a barrage of lightning strikes.

name: Lightning Trap
description: Tear a rift into the elemental planes, blasting nearby enemies with lightning bolts.
shortDescription: Tear a rift into the elemental planes, blasting nearby enemies with lightning bolts.

name: Magnetic Field
description: Form a sphere of electrical energy that arcs towards nearby enemies, damaging and pulling them inward.
shortDescription: Form a sphere of electrical energy that arcs towards nearby enemies, damaging and pulling them inward.

name: Freeze Blast
description: Unleash an expanding ring of frigid energy.
shortDescription: Unleash an expanding ring of frigid energy.

name: Blizzard
description: Invoke a powerful blizzard to shower your enemies with blades of ice.
shortDescription: Invoke a powerful blizzard to shower your enemies with blades of ice.

name: Icestrike
description: Inflict enemies with a biting frost.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Inflict enemies with a biting frost.

name: Fend
description: A powerful sword swing that damages nearby enemies in a wide arc.
shortDescription: A powerful sword swing that damages nearby enemies in a wide arc.

name: Discharge
description: Spark several fields of crackling synaptic energy.
shortDescription: Spark several fields of crackling synaptic energy.

name: Aqua Splash
description: Conjure a churning wave that crashes over enemies in the area.
shortDescription: **Skill-Dependent: Conjure a churning wave that crashes over enemies in the area.

name: Haunting Spirit
description: Release a tormented soul that seeks out the nearest enemy and wracks it with pain.
shortDescription: Release a tormented soul that seeks out the nearest enemy and wracks it with pain.

name: Weakness
description: Reveal the weak points of the target, increasing damage dealt to them.
shortDescription: Reveal the weak points of the target, increasing damage dealt to them.

name: Blade Barrier
description: Summon whirling blades which encircle you and barrage nearby enemies.
shortDescription: Summon whirling blades which encircle you and barrage nearby enemies.

name: Defend
description: Hoist your shield to deflect melee attacks and projectiles.
shortDescription: Hoist your shield to deflect melee attacks and projectiles.

name: Block Sorcery
description: Lift a field of magical energy to negate incoming spells.
shortDescription: Lift a field of magical energy to negate incoming spells.

name: Arcane Orbs
description: Orbs of arcane energy whirl around you, damaging nearby enemies. After a number of hits, these erupt in a sphere around you and deal additional damage.
shortDescription: Summon a rotating circle of arcane energy orbs.

name: Poison Nova
description: Release an expanding cloud of poisonous gas.
shortDescription: Release an expanding cloud of poisonous gas.

name: Aqua Beam
description: Release a destructive, pressurized jet of water, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies.
shortDescription: Release a destructive, pressurized jet of water.

name: Glacial Wall
description: Fabricate an impassable wall of ice.
shortDescription: Fabricate an impassable wall of ice.

name: Deflect Sorcery
description: Lift a field of magical energy to deflect incoming spells.
shortDescription: Lift a field of magical energy to negate incoming spells.

name: Energy Wave
description: Cast an energy projectile in the direction of the casting point.
shortDescription: Cast an energy projectile in the direction of the casting point.

name: Fire Nova
description: Cast an expanding ring of flame that grows in damage.

name: Protect Sorcery
description: Raise a magical shield that rotates around the caster and halves any magical damage.
shortDescription: Raise a magical shield that rotates around the caster and halves any magical damage.
